name: Pollution (Athryell)
description:
This project is for my very first Game Jam! Ludum Dare 47 - Stuck in a loop

I could have done more of course but I'm quite happy, I started learning how to code just a few month ago.

There are rare cases where a little bug shows up.. but I think in the other 90% of cases can be quite fun to beat the highscore :)
